nodes.text: Velko Jahen was a Soikan female who served as an aide to the Galactic Republic head of the Starlight Beacon space station during the High Republic Era. After arriving on the station, Velko had to deal with her new job and experiencing the Jedi of the Jedi Order for the first time.

At some point after the Slaughter on Daivak, Jahen approached Estala Maru while he was conversing with Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis and reported an ongoing Nihil attack in the Rseik sector. Maru thanked her for the information and gave the mission to Trennis.

Velko Jahen first appeared in the Star Wars Insider short story "Starlight: First Duty", written by Cavan Scott for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative. The character was first mentioned in the project's launch event on January 4, 2021.
